edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.chart

Class ChartUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.chart.ChartUtils

  • public class ChartUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This set of utilities provides a few services that generate and update chart components. It also generates a XYDataset that can be used to generate many other displays besides the ones provided here. Intended Operator: User

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean includeVarNameInLabel
      Flag to include variable name in the series label - allows each element to be have custom color and stroke

    • Constructor Summary

      ChartUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • configureLabels

        public static void configureLabels(org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel panel,
                                   java.lang.String x_axis_label,
                                   java.lang.String y_axis_label,
                                   java.lang.String overall_title,
                                   boolean show_legend)
        Configures the all of the main labels at once. Any label set to null will be not be displayed on the chart.
        Parameters:
        panel - chart panel that contains the chart to be configured
        x_axis_label - label to display at the x axis of the chart
        y_axis_label - label to display at the y axis of the chart
        show_legend - flag indicating if legend will be displayed
        overall_title - overall title displayed at top

      • createCombinedDomainXYChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.plot.CombinedDomainXYPlot createCombinedDomainXYChart(TrajectorySet trajectories,
                                                                                    RendererConfiguration rendering_config,
                                                                                    org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart... subplots)
        Creates a combined domain xy plot that will be used to house an arrangement of other charts.
        Parameters:
        trajectories - hybrid trajectory set to gather the data from
        rendering_config - the properties of the custom hybrid data renderer that allows the colors and strokes to be adjusted and assigned to specific elements
        subplots - sub plots to be added into the combined plot;
        Returns:
        the combined plot

      • createPanel

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createPanel(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart plot)
        Creates a chart panel to house a JFreeChart. This panel is needed to disable buffering so the image vectoring is produced correctly.
        Parameters:
        plot - the plot to be loaded into the panel
        Returns:
        chart panel containing specified plot

      • createPanel

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createPanel(TrajectorySet trajectories,
                                                     java.lang.String domain_axis_handle,
                                                     java.lang.String range_axis_handle)
        Creates a data set, chart, and panel all at once. Some of the inputs of this method can be null to use the defaults.
        Parameters:
        trajectories - set containing a set of trajectories that can be included in the plot
        domain_axis_handle - that is the name of a variable with trajectory data would be plotted on the x axis. There are predefined labels for time and jumps since they are often used as the domain, but another variable can be selected as well
        range_axis_handle - that is the name of a variable whose trajectory data would be plotted on the y axis
        Returns:
        chart panel loaded with the generated chart and data set

      • createPanel

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createPanel(TrajectorySet trajectories,
                                                     java.lang.String domain_axis_handle,
                                                     java.lang.String range_axis_handle,
                                                     ChartType type,
                                                     RendererConfiguration rendering_config,
                                                     org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart)
        Creates a data set, chart, and panel all at once. Some of the inputs of this method can be null to use the defaults.
        Parameters:
        trajectories - set containing a set of trajectories that can be included in the plot
        domain_axis_handle - that is the name of a variable with trajectory data would be plotted on the x axis. There are predefined labels for time and jumps since they are often used as the domain, but another variable can be selected as well
        range_axis_handle - that is the name of a variable whose trajectory data would be plotted on the y axis
        type - type of plot to be generated (null for default)
        rendering_config - the rendering configuration specifying the color and stroke characteristics of the rendered data (null for default)
        chart - an existing chart so that they can be customized before any data gets loaded (null for default)
        Returns:
        chart panel loaded with the generated chart and data set

      • createXYChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createXYChart(TrajectorySet trajectories,
                                                       org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset data_set,
                                                       org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart_layout,
                                                       RendererConfiguration rendering_config,
                                                       ChartType type)
        Creates an XY chart contained in a JFreeChart container.
        Parameters:
        trajectories - hybrid trajectory set to gather the data from
        data_set - data set that will be used to generate the chart
        chart_layout - a possible pre-formatted chart to be used, otherwise a null results in a new one being generated
        rendering_config - the properties of the custom hybrid data renderer that allows the colors and strokes to be adjusted and assigned to specific elements
        type - type of plot to be generated
        Returns:
        the generated chart

      • createXYDataset

        public static org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset createXYDataset(TrajectorySet data_set,
                                                          java.lang.String x_field_selection,
                                                          java.lang.String y_field_selection)
        Creates an XYDataset using the data from specified elements of trajectories within the trajectory set that match the selected variable names.
        Parameters:
        data_set - hybrid trajectory set to gather the data from
        x_field_selection - variable name of the x (domain) elements to be selected. It could also be one of the domain handles indicating the domain of the plot is time or jumps
        y_field_selection - variable name of the y (range) elements to be selected. Less likely than with the x selection,It could also be one of the domain handles indicating the range of the plot is time or jumps
        Returns:
        the file data set

      • getSeriesName

        private static java.lang.String getSeriesName(HybridTrajectoryElement<?> data)
        Determines series name of the trajectory element
        Parameters:
        data - hybrid trajectory element
        Returns:
        series name

      • newPanel

        public static javax.swing.JPanel newPanel()
        Create a new panel that is configured for use with a figure
        Returns:
        figure panel
